testcase.title: Check that selected terms on Search Aid page gets added to the bottom query box(search by letter)-- Advanced Search

substeps.message: I select collection on page BasicSearchPage

steps.title: I select collection "Derwent Innovations Index"
I select search "Advanced Search"
I click on link "Index List:CAC" on page "Advanced Search"
I click on the letter "A"
I add the terms to the field "Cited Assignee Name List" on page "Search Aid" with flag value "N"
I verify that query "A & A MFG CO INC OR A PTY LTD" gets added in bottom query box on "Search Aid" page

testcase.title: Check that selected terms gets added in bottom query box gets on "Cited Inventor Index" page

substeps.message: I select collection on page BasicSearchPage

steps.title: I select collection "Derwent Innovations Index"
I select search "Cited patent Search"
I click on link "select from Index:Cited Inventor Index" on page "Cited Patent Search"
I perform search with query "miller" on page "Cited Inventor Index" for field "Cited Inventor Index"
I add the terms to the field "Cited Inventor Index" on page "Cited Inventor Index" with flag value "N"

substeps.message: The bottom query box contains the selected query : MILLER A D OR MILLER A E

steps.title: I verify that query "MILLER A D OR MILLER A E" gets added in bottom query box on "Search Aid" page

testcase.title: Check that combined query is displayed on "Cited Patent Search" page after selecting different queries on Search Aid(Cited Inventor) Page

substeps.message: I select collection on page BasicSearchPage

steps.title: I select collection "Derwent Innovations Index"
I select search "Cited Patent Search"
I click on link "select from Index:Cited Inventor Index" on page "Cited Patent Search"
I perform search with query "cable" on page "Cited Inventor Index" for field "Cited Inventor Index"
I add the terms to the field "Cited Inventor Index" on page "Cited Inventor Index" with flag value "N"
I perform search with query "oil" on page "Cited Inventor Index" for field "Cited Inventor Index"
I add the terms to the field "Cited Inventor Index" on page "Cited Inventor Index" with flag value "Y"

substeps.message: The query CABLEJOROILARCD is added to Cited patent search page for Cited Inventor field

steps.title: I verify that the query "CABLE J OR OILAR C D" is present on page "Cited Patent Search:Cited Inventor"
I click on link "select from Index:Cited Inventor Index" on page "Cited Patent Search"
I click on the letter "B"
I add the terms to the field "Cited Inventor Index" on page "Cited Inventor Index" with flag value "Y"

substeps.message: The query CABLEJOROILARCDORB is added to Cited patent search page for Cited Inventor field

steps.title: I verify that the query "CABLE J OR OILAR C D OR B" is present on page "Cited Patent Search:Cited Inventor"

testcase.title: Check that no query gets added on "Cited Inventor Index" page after clicking on cancel on Search Aid page

substeps.message: I select collection on page BasicSearchPage

steps.title: I select collection "Derwent Innovations Index"
I select search "Cited patent Search"
I click on link "select from Index:Cited Inventor Index" on page "Cited Patent Search"
I perform search with query "cable" on page "Cited Inventor Index" for field "Cited Inventor Index"
I add the terms to the field "Cited Inventor Index" on page "Cited Inventor Index" with flag value "N"
I click on link "cancel" on page "search aid"

substeps.message: The text input is empty on Cited Patent Search Page/No query is added

steps.title: I verify that no query gets added on page "Cited Patent Search:Cited Inventor"

testcase.title: Check that no query gets added on "Cited Inventor Index"(when searching with a letter) page after clicking on cancel on Search Aid page

substeps.message: I select collection on page BasicSearchPage

steps.title: I select collection "Derwent Innovations Index"
I select search "Cited patent Search"
I click on link "select from Index:Cited Inventor Index" on page "Cited Patent Search"
I click on the letter "V"
I add the terms to the field "Cited Inventor" on page "Cited Inventor Index" with flag value "N"
I click on link "cancel" on page "search aid"

substeps.message: The text input is empty on Cited Patent Search Page/No query is added

steps.title: I verify that no query gets added on page "Cited Patent Search:Cited Inventor"
